name: Aladdin Ali
title: I build .NET APIs, integrations, and platform tooling
about: I build backend systems that hold up when the stakes are real: audits, on-call, and awkward integrations.
Most of my work is C#/.NET (APIs, automation, and data-heavy services), plus SQL performance work and deployments that donâ€™t create surprises.
When I go full-stack, I still aim for the same thing: clear workflows, predictable behavior, and a codebase teams can extend without fear.
buildingNow: A small set of audit/debugging helpers, plus a simple web shell for shipping polished side projects.
